SELECT COUNT(*) as totcnt FROM COMTN_DAM_PRO A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_DAM_MAP_KNO B ON A.KNWLDG_TY_CODE = B.KNWLDG_TY_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_DAM_MAP_TEAM C ON B.ORGNZT_ID = C.ORGNZT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVN_USER_MASTER D ON A.EXPERT_ID = D.ESNTL_ID WHERE 1=1
AND D.USER_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchVO.searchKeyword} ||'%'
AND B.KNWLDG_TY_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchVO.searchKeyword} ||'%'

SELECT C.ORGNZT_NM AS "orgnztNm" , C.ORGNZT_ID AS "orgnztId" , A.EXPERT_ID AS "speId" , D.USER_NM AS "userNm" , B.KNWLDG_TY_NM AS "knoTypeNm" , B.KNWLDG_TY_CODE AS "knoTypeCd" , A.EXPERT_GRAD AS "appTypeCd" , A.EXPERT_DC AS "speExpCn" , A.EXPERT_CONFM_DE AS "speConfmDe" , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID AS "frstRegisterId" , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS "frstRegisterPnttm" , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID AS "lastUpdusrId" , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM AS "lastUpdusrPnttm" FROM COMTN_DAM_PRO A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_DAM_MAP_KNO B ON A.KNWLDG_TY_CODE = B.KNWLDG_TY_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_DAM_MAP_TEAM C ON B.ORGNZT_ID = C.ORGNZT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVN_USER_MASTER D ON A.EXPERT_ID = D.ESNTL_ID WHERE A.EXPERT_ID = #{speId} AND A.KNWLDG_TY_CODE = #{knoTypeCd} AND A.EXPERT_GRAD = #{appTypeCd}
